Text:
"No need to install?" This is an installer it installs/extracts all the files to %appdata%
"No need to put serials etc" That's because we built the launcher.
"No boring installation of tool-bars" The TE launcher never had any of this in the installer.
"This makes a portable version" its not portable.

The_Duck1 this is not portable, it's an installer. Once Minecraft is installed your installer acts like an icon. You could have saved yourself quite some time if you just uploaded our Minecraft Launcher file which is less than 1mb big. The Launcher will download all the files needed.
Just run the .exe and thats it? thats what im getting out of this.
CAN YOU PLAY THIS VERSION OFFLINE OR DOES IT REQUIRE INTERNET ACCESS ?

Hey, I know you guys run a cracked server, and forgive me for asking a stupid question, but does a cracked server mean only people with a cracked version can play on it or can anyone play on it? (legal or non-legal players)
This is not a TeamExtreme torrent.
